quest: Which TWO of these are English civil war battles?
quest_zh: 其中兩個是英國內戰戰鬥？

quest: What is the name of the building where the Northern Irish Assembly meets?
quest_zh: 北愛爾蘭議會會議的建築物的名稱是什麼？

quest: Who appoints the government, which most people have chosen in a democratic election?
quest_zh: 誰任命大多數人在民主選舉中選擇的政府？

quest: Why was the Habeas Corpus Act (1679) so important?
quest_zh: 為什麼《人身保護法》（1679年）如此重要？

answers.answer: It gave women the right to vote
It guaranteed that no one could be held prisoner unlawfully
answers.answer_zh: 它保證沒有人可以非法囚禁

answers.answer: It limited the power of the monarch
It gave women their property rights
answers.answer_zh: 它賦予了婦女的財產權

quest: Who led the invasion of England in 1066?
quest_zh: 誰在1066年領導英格蘭入侵？

quest: In Northern Ireland, Deputy District Judges hear minor criminal cases
quest_zh: 在北愛爾蘭，副地區法官聽取了較小的刑事案件

quest: In Youth Courts, the name or photographs of the accused young person can be published in newspapers or used by the media
quest_zh: 在青年法院，被告年輕人的名稱或照片可以在報紙上出版或媒體使用

quest: Which of these statements is incorrect?
quest_zh: 這些陳述中的哪個不正確？

answers.answer: Selling or buying drugs such as heroin is illegal in the UK
answers.answer_zh: 在英國出售或購買海洛因等藥物是非法的

answers.answer: It's a criminal offence to offend one's religion or ethnic origin
answers.answer_zh: 冒犯自己的宗教或種族血統是刑事犯罪

answers.answer: It's a criminal offence to carry a weapon of any kind
answers.answer_zh: 攜帶任何形式的武器是刑事犯罪

answers.answer: It's a criminal offence to owe someone money

quest: Where was Anne Boleyn, the wife of Henry VIII who was accused of taking lovers, executed?
quest_zh: 亨利八世的妻子安妮·鮑林（Anne Boleyn）在哪裡被指控殺害戀人？

quest: In Northern Ireland, what letter does a newly qualified driver has to display for one year after passing the test?
quest_zh: 在北愛爾蘭，通過測試後，新資格的駕駛員必須在一年內展示什麼信？

quest: 'The Restoration' refers to the reestablishment of Roman Catholicism
quest_zh: 'The Restoration' refers to the reestablishment of Roman Catholicism

quest: Which of these is correct?
quest_zh: 其中哪一個是正確的？

answers.answer: Any man who forces a woman to have sex, including her husband, can be charged with rape
answers.answer_zh: 任何強迫女人做愛的男人，包括她的丈夫，都可以被指控強姦

answers.answer: Any man who forces a woman to have sex, excluding her husband, can be charged with rape
answers.answer_zh: 任何強迫女人做愛的男人，不包括丈夫，都可以被指控強姦

quest: What is the name given to the PM's country house?
quest_zh: 總理的鄉間別墅的名字是什麼？

quest: The Commonwealth is made up of countries which were once part of the British Empire only
quest_zh: 英聯邦由曾經是大英帝國的一部分的國家組成

quest: The devolved administrations each have their own civil service.
quest_zh: 權力的政府每個人都有自己的公務員。

quest: Which of these countries is currently part of the EU?
quest_zh: 這些國家目前是歐盟的一部分？

quest: The Reform Act of 1832 took away the automatic right of hereditary peers to attend the House of Lords
quest_zh: 1832年的《改革法案》奪走了世襲同齡人參加上議院的自動權利

quest: What is the Giant's Causeway made of?
quest_zh: 巨人的堤道是什麼？

quest: Which TWO are famous British fashion designers?
quest_zh: 哪兩個是著名的英國時裝設計師？

quest: Sir Kingsley Amis was a famous English novelist and poet who wrote more than 20 novels, including 'Lucky Jim'
quest_zh: 金斯利·阿米斯爵士（Sir Kingsley Amis）是一位著名的英國小說家和詩人，他寫了20多本小說，包括“幸運吉姆”

quest: Which TWO are famous UK sports stars?
quest_zh: 英國著名體育明星哪一位？

answers.answer_zh: 托馬斯·蓋恩斯伯勒（Thomas Gainsborough）

quest: During the civil war of 1455, what colour rose was the symbol of the House of Lancaster?
quest_zh: 在1455年內戰期間，蘭開斯特之家的象徵是什麼顏色？

quest: How can you visit the Welsh Assembly?
quest_zh: 您如何參觀威爾士議會？

answers.answer: By queuing at the public entrance all day
answers.answer_zh: 通過整天在公共入口排隊

quest: Dame Ellen MacArthur is famous for her achievements in which sport?
quest_zh: 埃倫·麥克阿瑟（Ellen MacArthur）夫人以她在哪種運動中取得的成就而聞名？
